title: King GK
author: King GK
content: Please I don't know if this is the best place for making this post Kindly bear with me if it is not but I care to know. What's are the best qualities of a good moderator must possesses.I felt he/she should not be prickly temperamental, so as not to penalized people on aggression must not be easily provoked be because everyone's capacity here is different. And hel/she must be biased, must not be a racist because cryptocurrency is for every nation and country and tribe Please what your own opinion ?üôè

comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: I guess the most important thing for a moderator to do is enforce the rules of the forum (whichever forum that may be). Bitcointalk is actually good in the sense that free speech is encouraged here, it‚Äôs actually quite difficult to get banned. There are no snowflake rules here & I love that. The most enforced rule I see here for bans distributed is for plagiarism. I see people getting posts deleted for being low quality of off topic, people enjoy reporting posts here so a moderator must respond to reports subjectively.I haven‚Äôt seen any bad moderating here, you can tell that because it‚Äôs very rare you see people starting threads to complain about the moderating.
